attributes.action: do all in his power to persuade Michael Martin to stand down in favour of Frank Field
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Frank Field's honesty and plain common sense are legendary, unlike the current occupant of the job. He is a perfect fit.

rejection.details: Speaker Michael Martin announced on May 19 he will step down in June.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
